"Exploration Sections":
"Exploration Sections are peaceful areas populated by various plants and animals.

When entering an Exploration Section, a green icon will appear next to the section name to show what type it is."
"Exploration Sections have a small number of enemies, so you can safely go in alone or with a small group to collect Gathering Materials."

"On occasion, high-level enemies or powerful boss enemies may appear in an Exploration Section.

If you find yourself getting overwhelmed, you will need to run away or call for help."
